summary:
Veteran A_s EKG note was recorded in Veteran B_s medical record. Veteran B signed a release form for his records to be released to an insurance company for a claim and his records were printed and released on March 25, 2013. The insurance company told Veteran B that they denied his claim because of Veteran A_s note. His record was amended to remove this note. The body of the note contained Veteran A_s full name, full SSN, and details about EKG results and pacemaker implant.
The documents released to the insurance company were not recovered.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
